description: Eastern flavours bring these crispy and sweet snacks together.
keywords: Savoury fritter,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Mango,Sesame free
name: Mango & Onion Pakora Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large white onion, peeled and sliced
1 large mango, peeled, de-seeded and finely chopped
1 small green chilli, de-seeded and sliced
1 small red chilli, de-seeded and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine all of your batter ingredients but incrementally add the flour until its a thick batter.
In a separate bowl, combine the onion with the mango and chillies.
Now combine both bowls fully together.
Heat up a pan suitable for shallow frying.
Separate the pakoras into your desired shape and size.
Shallow fry for 6 minutes while turning halfway.
Remove from the heat and allow some of the excess oils by placing on some kitchen paper.
